newsitem.title: THAILAND: Trading in Int'l Trust shares to resume.
newsitem.headline: Trading in Int'l Trust shares to resume.

text.p: The Stock Exchange of Thailand said on Thursday it had allowed trading to resume in shares of International Trust and Finance Plc after it had disclosed some material information sought by the bourse.
The SET had halted trading in ITF's shares in the afternoon session on Wednesday.
ITF said later on Wednesday that the company was negotiating the sale of a stake in the firm with two foreign financial institutions.
It said there was no conclusion yet on the negotiations and it did not name the foreign parties.
ITF was one of 10 finance firms ordered by the central bank in March to raise capital to beat liquidity woes.
